EmailTemplate.description: Sends an email to the applicant to complete a report on their program sponsorship.
EmailTemplate.name: BIC-Grant - Program Follow-Up Report Request (1) Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Business Incubation Grant Application-Program Reporting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Business_Incubation_Grants__c.First_Name__c},
Just a quick reminder that we need you to please submit a report on your activities from the past year as part of the City's support for your program. Please complete the following survey:
https://cityoftoronto.tfaforms.net/355818?tfa_10={!Business_Incubation_Grants__c.Name}
Thanks and please keep us involved in your upcoming activities.
Regards,
Nina
Nina Gesa Economic Development Officer City of Toronto www.toronto.ca/business
